page.title: 08The Michelin Road Race.
page.content: On Sunday June 3,The Michelin l0 road race was being held at the Michelin Athletics Club.The race started at 12.00 am with 2,700 runners taking part.The michelin tyre company organised the 10 mile race and the day very well.Inside the Michelin Athletics Club there was a lot of sportswear on sale.Outside was a large marquee.Inside the marquee there were people selling refreshments for the visitors and runners. The first runner to finish was a man from Wolverhampton and Bilston,his time was 50.05.The first woman to finish was from Harlow Athletics Club in a time of 6l.47.At the end of the race all the runners received a ceramic plaque.My next door neighbour ran in the Michelin l0 road race.His time was 64.12.After the race had finished all the men and women had drinks and refreshments.
